The cost of braces or other orthodontic treatment should never keep you from achieving the smile you've always wanted.

How much does Damon Smile cost?

Because the cost of braces varies with each individual case, upon your initial consultation we'll be able to determine the cost of braces based on your specific needs. Factors that can influence the cost of braces are case difficulty, length of treatment, and insurance coverage.

Insurance

Many dental insurance plans cover the cost of orthodontics including treatment with Damon Smile. Insurance coverage varies so check with your provider to determine the extent of coverage for your treatment.

Payment Options

  • Affordable monthly payments available
  • Various payment arrangements to coincide with your Flex Plan needs
  • Most major credit cards accepted
